newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: OMV hopes for early plastics deal with Repsol.
newsitem.headline: OMV hopes for early plastics deal with Repsol.

text.p: Austrian oil and chemicals group OMV AG said on Tuesday it was continuing negotiations with Spain's Repsol with the aim of setting up a plastics joint venture.
Chief executive Richard Schenz said he hoped the two sides would succeed in striking a deal in the polyolefin sector before the end of the year.
"As long as we are in talks with Repsol we will not enter negotiations with anyone else," Schenz told a news conference.

Initial talks with Repsol on a polyolefin joint venture stalled in January, but OMV said then it remained keen to find an international partner for its plastics business. -- Vienna Newsroom, 43-1-53112-258
